resources.string: Add money to your PayPal balance in 3 easy steps:
1. First, snap a photo of each side of your signed cheque.
3. Once approved, void the cheque. We\'ll add the money to your balance.

This service is provided by First Century Bank, N.A. and Ingo Money, Inc., which are third-party service providers that operate independently from PayPal. PayPal may share some of your profile information with Ingo and First Century to help service your cash-a-cheque request.
To cash your cheques, we\'ll need access to your location, camera and phone calls.
You\'ll be asked to grant permission on the next screens.
You\'ll need to change your permissions to allow PayPal to access your camera, location and phone calls.
